quest.name: Notorious Biggs
journal: Wedge is determined to find Biggs.

Wedge has again implored you to search for Biggs. Though Abelie's suggestion yielded nothing, it is possible that one of the other Ishgardians stationed at Monument Tower might be able to point you in a more fruitful direction.

Ignace suggests that Biggs may have attempted to reach Whitebrim Front. If true, he would have needed to make his way through Daniffen Pass, whose southern entrance is found to the northeast of Monument Tower.
With the aid of Yda and Y'shtola, you succeed in rescuing Biggs from a detachment of imperial troops. Make your way back to Monument Tower and speak with Wedge.

With Biggs's safe return, the three core members of Garlond Ironworks are together again, and the future seems brighter for their reunion. Now it is time to turn your thoughts to the next challenge: rescuing Minfilia and the remaining Scions.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: We can't give up, Forename! We must find Biggs before he succumbs to the cold or is recaptured!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: There must be someone in this tower who can help us, even if it's only to tell us where else to look!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Ask them for me! Ask anyone who'll listen! And hurry! Biggs's chances of survival grow slimmer by the moment!

dialogue.name: IGNACE
dialogue.text: Your friend is lost in the wilderness, you say?

dialogue.name: IGNACE
dialogue.text: If he's not to be found around here or in the vicinity of the Darkhold, it is possible he made for Whitebrim.

dialogue.name: IGNACE
dialogue.text: To reach it, one must travel through Daniffen Pass, the southern end of which lies to the north and east of here.

dialogue.name: IGNACE
dialogue.text: While I make no guarantee that your search will bear fruit, it is surely better than worrying in idleness. I wish you luck.

dialogue.name: IGNACE
dialogue.text: ...Oh, and one more thing. Do tread warily when climbing the stairs here. Not a moon ago, I near broke my neck when I slipped and took a tumble.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Forename! We've found Biggs, but he's in trouble!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: Our orders are to take you back, dead or alive! Which will it be, Engineer?

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Why don't you come and find out, tin-head!?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, it is well that you are here. The situation is grave.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Biggs is in a bad way! We need to do something, right now!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Yda has the right of it. He will perish if we delay.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: With me!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: He's not alone! Kill them all!

dialogue.name: DUMMY
dialogue.text: (QIB)

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: <pant> M-My thanks... <pant> Another m-moment, and...I-I would have... <grunt>

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: He has been too long in the cold. We must find shelter for him.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: ...Monument Tower, you say? Very well, Yda and I shall bear him there with all haste.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Cid will be so happy to see Biggs and Wedge again! Awww, I love reunions!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I cannot thank you enough, Forename─and the same goes for the rest of you! Thank you all so much!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Oh, don't mention it!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: We are a family, are we not?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Well...well, yes. It's just─ <sniff> It's just, I didn't think─ <sniff> I didn't think I'd ever see him again. <sob>

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: I owe the lot of you my life.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: And you saved Wedge's too, Forename. I'm losing count of how many I owe you.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Biggs! Wedge! Gods, it's good to see the two of you again!

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Chief! It's you! It's really you!

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: In our hearts, we knew you were still alive... But to finally see you in the flesh... <sniff>

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: When Alphinaud told me of the raid on the Waking Sands, I feared the worst. What happened?

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: The enemy struck with nary a warning. We didn't stand a chance.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Wedge and I were in the workshop when they came. Before we knew what was happening, the imperials had us at gunpoint.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: It must have been awful... There's one thing I don't understand, though: how did the Garleans get there so fast? I mean, the Immortal Flames should have seen them coming, right?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I myself have asked the same question. That day, when I returned to the carnage at the Waking Sands, I noted naught amiss in Horizon─nothing at all to suggest the passing of an imperial force. From this, I conclude that the Garleans came neither by land nor by air. Nay, they were borne there by potent teleportation magicks─magicks of the kind used by the Ascians.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Carry on.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: We were bound and blindfolded, and bundled into the cargo bay of a waiting airship.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: I can't rightly say how long we were aboard, but when the time came for us to disembark, we found ourselves in the midst of an imperial stronghold─Castrum Centri.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Upon arrival, we were marched off into the main complex. Biggs and I were thrown into a detainment cell together, while Minfilia and the others were taken elsewhere. That was the last we heard from them.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Castrum Centri...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: What happened next?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Well, we were held in isolation for what felt like years, but was probably moons...or maybe only weeks. And then, without warning, the imperials collected the pair of us, and put us on another vessel, which we found out was bound for Garlemald, much to our dread. We knew that if we were taken back there, we weren't like to leave again.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: So, risky though it was, we sabotaged the ship's altitude control and thereby forced an emergency landing. And in the midst of the ensuing chaos, we managed to slip our captors. The rest, as they say, is history.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hah! If I didn't know better, I'd call that a likely story! Sabotaging the altitude controls of an airborne vessel!? That will have been Biggs's handiwork, like as not. You always were resourceful in a tight spot, my friend!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Forename─thank you for returning my dear assistants to me. It would seem I owe you yet another debt of gratitude.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: There are still many questions in my mind, but the answers can wait─Minfilia and the others still want for rescue.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: All right, you lot─Garlond Ironworks is back in business! Let's go and give the imperials what for!

dialogue.name: BIGGSWEDGE
dialogue.text: (-Biggs and Wedge-)Hurrah!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Protect Biggs and defeat the imperial troops!

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: H-How did you know where to find me?

dialogue.name: IMPERIALLEADER
dialogue.text: Hold your ground! Reinforcements are coming!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: The more the merrier! I'll pound you all into the next Umbral Era!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Yda! Less provoking and more pummeling, if you would be so kind!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALLEADER
dialogue.text: Vanguards, destroy them!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Forename! Stay close to Biggs!

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Ack! How many of them are there!?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text:
...More than are conducive to merriment.
Next time, Yda, have a care what you wish for.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: This is the last of them!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I cannot...go on...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: I need to rest...just for a little...while...

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Ungh... Not here...not now...

obj.n: Doubt Truth to Be a Liar
